TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void HelpEventHandler(object sender, HelpEventArgs hlpevent);
.class public auto ansi sealed HelpEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub HelpEventHandler(sender As Object, hlpevent As HelpEventArgs)
public delegate void HelpEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, HelpEventArgs ^ hlpevent);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将用来处理 的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关与委托一起处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理事件以便包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示自定义帮助内容。The following example demonstrates handling the event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields. 通过按 F1 键和焦点位于地址字段中，或通过使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击帮助光标地址字段上的引发事件。The event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field. 属性设置为 true，则指示`HelpRequested`处理事件。The property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled. 该示例还演示存储中的帮助文本属性。The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CPP/helpevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CS/helpevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/VB/helpevent.vb#1)]
